Label.en: It was taken by the Nazis during World War 2!
Label.fr: Le tableau a été volé par les nazis durant la seconde guerre mondiale !
Label.es: It was taken by the Nazis during World War 2!
Label.zh: It was taken by the Nazis during World War 2!

Label.en: The Astronomer was stamped on the back with a black swastika..
Label.fr: L'Astronome était tamponné au dos avec une crois gammée..
Label.es: The Astronomer was stamped on the back with a black swastika..
Label.zh: The Astronomer was stamped on the back with a black swastika..

Label.en: Thanks to the efforts of the Monuments Men, it was rescued and returned!
Label.fr: Grace aux efforts des Monuments Men, il a été récupéré!
Label.es: Thanks to the efforts of the Monuments Men, it was rescued and returned!
Label.zh: Thanks to the efforts of the Monuments Men, it was rescued and returned!

Label.en: If you didn't know, they were a group of soldiers tasked with finding stolen paintings!
Label.fr: C'était un groupe de soldats affecté spécialement à la recherche des tableaux volés !
Label.es: If you didn't know, they were a group of soldiers tasked with finding stolen paintings!
Label.zh: If you didn't know, they were a group of soldiers tasked with finding stolen paintings!

Label.en: A movie about them was made in 2014, featuring George Clooney and Matt Damon!
Label.fr: Un film leur a été consacré en 2014, avec George Clooney et Matt Damon
Label.es: A movie about them was made in 2014, featuring George Clooney and Matt Damon!
Label.zh: A movie about them was made in 2014, featuring George Clooney and Matt Damon!

Label.en: After being returned, it was placed in the Louvre, and is still there today, unless it's away being reunited with it's brother!
Label.fr: Après sa restitution, il a été placé au Louvr. Il y est toujours...sauf s'il est parti rejoindre son frère !
Label.es: After being returned, it was placed in the Louvre, and is still there today, unless it's away being reunited with it's brother!
Label.zh: After being returned, it was placed in the Louvre, and is still there today, unless it's away being reunited with it's brother!
